package.name: nudgespot
package.summary: Nudgespot lets you communicate with your customers (via email/sms), based on their interactions on your store.
package.description:
This extension connects Magento to Nudgespot. Nudgespot simplifies all your interactions with your customers.
Using Nudgespot, you can:
1. Send newsletter style messages via email, SMS or push notifications. 2. Send messages based on what your customers do (or don't) on your store. Examples: cart abandonment emails, birthday greeting/offers, etc 3. Look up customers by their interactions, and send targeted messages to them. Example: Notify accessories available to customers that bought certain camera.
How it works:
This extension tracks activities of your customers on your store. You can then go to your Nudgespot dashboard and:
1. Trigger messages based on rules. 2. Send a broadcast style message to all or certain groups of customers. 3. Look up customers based on any attributes, or even based on their interactions. 4. Add customers to lists, and let Nudgespot automatically add/remove them from them, based on rules you specify.
The extension currently tracks the following activities: * Cart updates * Purchase * Register * Reviews * Search
